sentences.en: £2,500 for software is soon swallowed up in general costs.
sentences.cn: 用于软件方面的2,500英镑很快就被一般性费用耗光了。

sentences.en: Back in the dark ages of computing, in about 1980, they started a software company.
sentences.cn: 早在计算机尚未普及的时代（约1980年），他们就创办了软件公司。

sentences.en: Being boss of a software firm beats selling insurance.
sentences.cn: 当软件公司的老板比卖保险强多了。

sentences.en: Edit the input text and re-run the software.
sentences.cn: 修改输入的文本，重新运行软件。

sentences.en: Europe's software companies still have a growing home market.
sentences.cn: 欧洲软件公司的国内市场仍在增长中。

sentences.en: How easy was it to configure the software?
Most applications software for personal computers cost over $500 a throw.
sentences.cn: 个人电脑使用的多数应用软件的单价为500多美元。

sentences.en: Most software programs allow you to compose emails offline.
sentences.cn: 大部分软件程序允许用户在脱机状态下写电子邮件。

sentences.en: S&G offers great buys on computer software.
sentences.cn: S&G公司可提供性价比很高的电脑软件。
她给电脑装上新的软件。

sentences.en: Supporters say open source software is more secure.
sentences.cn: 拥护者认为开放源代码软件安全性更高。

sentences.en: The security software he uses is home brew.
sentences.cn: 他用的安全软件是自己编的。
这个软件包由5个只读光盘组成。

sentences.en: There is a bug in the software.
These programs will integrate with your existing software.
sentences.cn: 这些程序将和你的已有软件可综合成整体。

sentences.en: You can customize the software in several ways.
sentences.cn: 你可用几种方法按需要编制这个软件。

phrases.tran_cn: 杀毒软件；抗毒软件；防毒软件

trans.tran_en: the sets of programs that tell a computer how to do a particular job
